11.title: Ty Lee, Azula, and Mai

111.title: Azula is diapered by the others

1111.content:
"This looks wonderful!" Ty Lee exclaimed as she bounded into the main room of the home. The house was newly created, having new appliances as well as excellent woodwork along the walls. The main area was divided into a kitchen space, a small dining room area, and a large living room area. The floors were dark hardwood except for tile in the kitchen area which was slate grey. The walls were the same dark wood as the flooring, with a few pictures of beaches and flowers adorning them. There were a few more doors leading to the two bedrooms and the spacious bathroom with a tub large enough for 4 people, the floors being the same hardwood and tile respectively. "It's a lot larger than I imagined." She admitted to her friend.
         "It's a two bedroom 1 bathroom place, what were you expecting?" Mai asked as she closed the door behind them and walked over to the couch. "So what do you want to do?" she asked as she sat.
         Ty Lee cartwheeled over and sat next to Mai, "Well I don't know," she blushed, "did you want to talk a bit?"
         Mai shrugged, "Alright, but you first." Ty Lee giggled as the two began talking for a bit and catching up on what had been going on recently.
         "So what happened with you and Zuko?" Ty Lee asked, kicking her feet off the edge of the couch.
         Mai sighed, "It just wasn't working out, there was an incident with a reporter and Zuko blew his temper one time to many with me and we fought." she explained, crossing her arms and looking away from Ty Lee.
         Ty Lee crawled closer to her, "I'm sorry Mai, is there anything I can do to help?" she asked, sitting on her lap now.
         Mai blushed, "It's okay Ty Lee. I also realized something else." she began, her voice drifting off. Ty Lee blinked at her then leaned in by her ear to let her whisper, "I... like you." she blushed. "That's why I wanted you to come down here with me."
         Ty Lee gave Mai a quick kiss on her cheek before pulling back to face her, "You've known I've always liked girls more than guys, no need to blush Mai." she giggled as Mai blushed again. "I'd like to try being together if you're okay with that?" Mai gave Ty Lee a long kiss on the lips. Ty Lee giggled again, "There is something else though..." she drifted off. "You know how Azula is coming down and we're supposed to help rehabilitate her?" Mai nodded. "Well, I've got a plan that I'd like to try to help her if that's okay and that gives us some revenge?"
         "But what does that have to do with us?" Mai asked confused.

         Mai sighed, "I'm okay with dirty diapers, I just wasn't expecting you to bring them up. Actually, that sounds great! I want to get some revenge on her." Ty Lee slid off Mai's lap as the two curled their legs up and faced one another. "Okay, so we're diapering Azula; how does that help her? And what effect does that have on us?"
         "For the second one, it's just because we'll be seeing Azula naked and taking care of her. I just wanted you to know before we start being a thing in case something changes." Ty Lee blushed.
         Mai laughed, "You think I might want Azula instead?" Ty Lee turned her head away. "Hey," Mai reached over to turn her back, "you're one of the sweetest people I've met and I think you look beautiful." She kissed Ty Lee deeply for the first time and sat back down, "Don't think for a second you're inferior or compare yourself to her or anyone else. I want to be with you Ty Lee, I care about you and I hope you feel the same."
         Ty Lee's eyes began to water as she jumped into her hold, "I do Mai."
         Mai began rubbing her back gently and let Ty Lee calm down a bit before resuming, "So how are the diapers supposed to help?"
         Ty Lee sniffed and sat back up, "I thought we'd try giving her a new start, not completely of course. Just diapering her and taking extra care of her, maybe babying her too depending on how she reacts to it all." Mai nodded in understanding of the concept, they both knew of Azula's childhood. "I'm going to use my chi-blocking to take out her firebending, bathroom control, and so she can only crawl." Ty Lee added.
         Mai slowly nodded her head, "Are we sure she'll be okay with this?"
         Ty Lee shrugged, "The guy told me she has improved significantly, and she could use an experience like this. A restart on childhood and a chance to reconnect with us, to let her try and trust us again now that she's reforming."
         Mai grinned, "This is an opportunity we can't miss, getting to diaper her should be fun."
         Ty Lee smiled at that, "And maybe it'll give us practice for when we raise kids?"

1111.title: Remote vacation home

1211.content:
After Jinora's adventure in the spirit world and her subsequent return to her body, she found that she was incontinent and was ashamed of the fact for several weeks. Upon Korra's return to Avatar Island Korra felt so bad about the situation she made a bargain with Jinora, she would let her do whatever she wanted to Korra as recompense. After some thought Jinorra had come up with an idea, she would have Korra wear a diaper and be babied by her. Korra reluctantly agreed as the two went shopping for items Korra would need.

Our story starts at Korra's apartment after the two finished shopping...

122.content:
Jinora is now 20 years old, and has found herself enjoying diapers ever since she was temporarily put in some while she was in the spirit world. Korra is now 23, and is coming over to Air-bender Isle to say hi to Jinora, who had the island to herself and was taking advantage of it.

Our story starts as Korra secretly arrives to surprise her... How should Korra react to the situation?
122.title: They wanted to

1222.content:

Jinora had the entire island to herself, the rest of her family and all the attendants were going to be away for several weeks and Jinora had elected to stay on the island and to "continue studying air-bending" as she had told her parents. With her being 20, she was allowed to do essentially whatever she wanted, and her father nodded his approval, slight disappointment in his heart as his daughter was grown up now. After a few attempts to sway her otherwise, she was left alone on the island. Once the coast was clear, Jinora had almost immediately gone to her room and pulled out her stash of diapers and changing supplies then changed herself into one of her light purple disposable diapers. The inside of the diaper was still soft to her touch, as a smile crept across her face as she walked out of her room wearing only the shirt and diaper. "I think I will do some self studying," Jinora said to herself, "but I'm staying diapered this entire time." she smiled waddling slightly as she stepped outside.

Korra kept running towards Jinora, wondering if she might be trying a swimsuit on or something, as she noticed the purple undergarment around Jinora's waist.          Jinora tried shaking her off at first then let herself be hugged, "I thought I had the whole place to myself for a few weeks," she cried, "I just wanted to have my diaper time."
         "Shh," Korra said, patting Jinora on her back trying to get her to calm down, "it's okay, just let it out."

         Jinora sniffed, "Only if you never tell this to anyone and let me have a few days alone."

         Jinora leapt back in surprise, "Korra!"
         "Too much?" she asked.
         "Where the hell did that come from?" Jinora asked, crossing her arms.
         "Well..." it was Korra's turn to blush, "I just think you're really hot right now." Jinora blushed as well, "And I want to join you here."
         "No way!" Jinora stated staring down Korra, "you're trying to trick me or something."
         "Honest Jinora!" Korra pleaded, "I really do want to be with you."
1222.title: Korra thinks it might be fun to try out diapers...

12221.content:
Jinora led Korra to her room wair her diaper stash is and got owt a purple diaper and changing supply's "ok I'm going to go owt in the hall you get changed" Jinora said as she walked owt.
5 minutes later Korra walked owt in just a blue tank top and a diaper "what do you think" asked Korra. "You look cute" jinora gigiled as she slapped korra's diaper."oi watch it" Korra said jokingly slapping jinora's diaper squishing some of the poo. "Hoo!"jinora sounding shocked and aroused. After a while of training...

"So go"jinora said holding back a gigil.
